text.div:
Functional Status Observation: SNF MDS Functional Status Assessment within 3 Days of Discharge

What was the patient's usual performance related to their ability to transfer in and out of a car or van on the passenger side? Does not include the ability to open/close door or fasten seat belt.

code.text: What was the patient's usual performance related to their ability to transfer in and out of a car or van on the passenger side?  Does not include the ability to open/close door or fasten seat belt.
